name: Connect Write
overview:
Connect Write is a freelance copywriting service run by Elizabeth Joss. Elizabeth is passionate about the written word and everything to do with writing. She provides a high-quality service to her clients and is meticulous in everything she does. Connect Write operates in the Cape Town area. We prefer to meet clients in person, although we are able to work remotely with clients who are not based in Cape Town.

Connect Write believes that creating good copy is intrinsically linked to creating meaningful relationships with clients and their customers. Connect Write believe that copywriting does so much more than inform the reader. Good copy should draw the reader in, engage and encourage him or her to go out there and purchase the product. Therefore, Connect Write strives to create inspiring and persuasive copy! We create copy for all businesses and all occasions!
